noah's about page

Hi! I'm Noah Victoriano, and I love combat sports.

I'm a student at Cavite State University, and I am currently taking Bachelor of Science in Development Management majoring in Training Program Management. I'm a 4th year irregular student and currently employed as a muscle at a store in my city wet market to support my studies. I've been programming for the past 3 years where I lean towards systems programming and Backend development mainly devops. Below are few of my interests and hobbies if youd like:

• Manga/Anime. pluto, 20th century boys, kingdom, Dorohedoro and Shamo.
• Combat Sports. Muay thai, judo, BJJ and wrestling.
• Tech. Mostly microcontrollers, linux, servers, and programming.
• Gaming. Valorant, Dota 2, Path of exile 1, and all metro games.
• History. Mythology, ancient history, and world war 2.

I am open to any opportunities that come my way, so feel free to reach out if you have any questions or just want to chat. I am always looking for new challenges and experiences to help me grow as a person and a developer.

Setup

I'm retatively poor, so I don't have a lot of fancy stuff. But here are the things I use on a daily basis:

Hardware

• Laptop: HP 15dw1000 - i5 10210U, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 500GB HDD. This is a laptop that I repaired that is why it has a lot of cracks and when I got it, It has no battery, destroyed back panel.

• Monitor: LP156WHB TP A2 15.6" 1366x768 60Hz. This is a laptop screen that I salvaged from a broken laptop. I use it as a secondary monitor for my laptop.

• Keyboard: A4 Tech - This is a cheap keyboard I bought in bundle for around 250 php. I've been using this for 5 years which aside from scratches there is noting wrong with it. Great keyboard tbh

• Mouse: Rakk Altis - This is a cheap mouse I bought for around 300 php. Great mouse for big hands and it's made in the Philippines #SupportLocal.

• IEMs: QKZ A6 pro - This is actually a nice sounding IEM. I never want to wear headphones it just hurt my ears especially when extended use.

• Phone: Realme Note 50 - This phone I bought for 3.5k php. Nothing special about it. I just use it as an mp3 player and messages.

Software
I have a highly configured Arch Linux setup with i3wm and a lot of custom scripts.I have a lot of custom scripts that I use for automation and productivity. I plan to make a dotfiles repo but I'm too preoccupied by other things for now.
